Name: Skript
About the game: The popular words board game playable in six different languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish. Grab seven tiles from the bag and place them on the board, constructing words and earning points. Two or four players play Skript by turns, and one of these players can be the computer. Enjoy unlimited hours of entertainment while you increase your vocabulary and improve your spelling skills.
